report.title: Overviews - sample details
report.description: A report to display the sample information on various sample details pages.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id = s.location_id AND l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences o on o.sample_id = s.id LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and ttlav.deleted=false and ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#taxa_taxon_list_trait_attr_ids#) WHERE s.id = #sample_id# AND #website_filter#

param.name: sample_id
param.description: Sample id to retrieve data for.

param.name: taxa_taxon_list_trait_attr_ids
param.description: Comma separated in of the attribute ids that hold species traits.

report.columns:
-- Number Analysed is the summed abundance in the sample that actually have traits, as the user can select any species, not just pantheon ones with traits
--What percentage of the sample's summed abundance actually have Pantheon traits.
